item.title: Windows Phone 7 Mango features
item.description: A lot has been said and written about Windows Phone 7 Mango. The eagerly awaited update to Microsoftâ€™s new Windows Phone platform is said to sport 500 new features, bringing it up to par with its competition. While 500 features sound a lot, it may well be achieved if you count every little detail. Many of the bigger features can be found all over the web, especially in the much detailed Engadget in-depth preview.
